title: 148864261.executing Recipes
excerpt: Anyone can follow a recipe. The difference between a novice cook and a professional chef is their ability to execute all the steps.

children.text: Anyone can follow a recipe. The difference between a novice cook and a professional chef is their ability to execute all the steps.
And, it’s not just those listed, either, but the unspoken steps of how to dice an onion or flambé a crepe—flawlessly.

Of course, it doesn’t just apply to cooking. GPT-3 can easily give you a five or ten or twenty-step process for upgrading your service experience or improving your SEO, but the crux of the craft is the ability to do
Implementing user feedback means very little unless you know how to do it right. Same goes for the kinds of stories you’ll want to amplify or fight shy of.
In other words: it’s one thing to know a recipe. Entirely another to bring it to life.
